name: User
doc: structure representing a user in the system

fields.name: firstname
fields.doc: the user's real world first name

fields.name: lastname
fields.doc: the user's real world last name

fields.name: active
fields.doc: if true, indicates that the account is still enabled (not deactivated)

fields.name: id
fields.doc: unique identifier of the user within the system

fields.name: addedDate
fields.doc: date when the user was added to the system

fields.name: addedTime
fields.doc: time when the user was added to the system
